articles.description: MORNING BRIEFING: A man aged in his 20s has died in a motorcycle crash in Sydney's south, and Qantas boss Alan Joyce says he hopes the flying kangaroo will come back strongly before Christmas.
articles.content:
Here's what you need to know this morning.
Motorcyclist dies after crashing into pole
Emergency services were called to crash on Forest Road about 3:30am.(ABC News)
